animation.description:
The animation.
If `false` the animation effect is disabled.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

height.description:
Height of the skeleton.
Useful when you don't want to adapt the skeleton to a text element but for instance a card.

variant.description: The type of content that will be rendered.

width.description:
Width of the skeleton.
Useful when the skeleton is inside an inline element with no width of its own.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.text: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="text"`.
descriptions.rect: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="rect"`.
descriptions.circle: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="circle"`.
descriptions.pulse: Styles applied to the root element if `animation="pulse"`.
descriptions.wave: Styles applied to the root element if `animation="wave"`.
